bibl.title: Parerga: Notes on Christian Inscriptions from Egypt and Nubia.
bibl.note: I. A family of donors from the Panopolite: S.B. I, 1597 and White Monastery. - II. The day young Gregory died: Coptic stela Liebieghaus 13 (S.B. Kopt. [= K.S.B.] III, 1596). - III. A Bishop Leo in Sai? [ed.: Bernard BOYAVAL, Une stèle grecque inédite de l'île de Saï, REg 24 (1972) pp. 20-24, 1 fig.].
bibl.seg: VAN DER VLIET Jacques, Parerga: Notes on Christian Inscriptions from Egypt and Nubia.

I. A family of donors from the Panopolite: S.B. I, 1597 and White Monastery. - II. The day young Gregory died: Coptic stela Liebieghaus 13 (S.B. Kopt. [= K.S.B.] III, 1596). - III. A Bishop Leo in Sai? [ed.: Bernard BOYAVAL, Une stèle grecque inédite de l'île de Saï, REg 24 (1972) pp. 20-24, 1 fig.].
